summary: A developmentally disabled young man tries to continue the work his father did in communicating with extra-terrestrials from outer space, which leads to something miraculous and wonderful.
cast: Hrithik Roshan|Rekha|Preity Zinta|Rakesh Roshan|Prem Chopra|Rajat Bedi|Johnny Lever|Mukesh Rishi|Anuj Pandit|Mohit Makkad|Jai Choksi|Omkar Purohit|Hansika Motwani|Pranita Bishnoi|Beena Banerjee|Chhote Ustad|Bobby Bedii|K.D. Chandran|Mithilesh Chaturvedi|Dimple Inamdar|Ravi Jhankal|Jaswir Kaur|Afzal Khan|Akash Khurana|Rahul Mahajan|Tony Mirrcandani|Anjana Mumtaz|Sunita Padbidri|Kashish Duggal Paul|Kamya Punjabi|Aryaman Sapru|Vivek Shauq|Sheeba|Rajeev Verma
title: Koi... Mil Gaya
